Question
========
  
Marleen wants to investigate whether students who go on vacation more often (as measured by the number of days of vacation in the past year) get higher grades (as measured by the average exam grade in the past year). She suspects that the correlation is weaker the more intelligent the students are (measured by an IQ test). What analysis technique should she use to test this hypothesis?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple linear regression analysis without interaction.
* Multiple linear regression analysis with interaction.
* Two-way ANOVA without interaction.
* Two-way ANOVA with interaction.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
